entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Haldimand County
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:53 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.4°C

Visibility: 6.4 km

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie this morning and early this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Amount 15 cm near Lake Erie. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
